DOC.HEADLINE: WORLD CUP USA ' 94 / THE FIRST ROUND ; SPOTLIGHT ; MAYBE SOME ROOMS IN THE WHITE_HOUSE ?
DOC.TEXT: Washington is a popular destination in the summer , but not for Switzerland ' s soccer team . If the_Swiss had beaten Colombia on Sunday at Palo Alto and won Group_A , they would have played their second-round game in Los Angeles . Instead , they will play either Spain or Bolivia in the capital next Saturday . " Exactly what we did not want , " said Guido Cornella , the_Swiss soccer federation ' s first vice_president , complaining that the team will have to adjust to the time change and the humidity in Washington . There is one other inconvenience . " I ' m going_to Washington tomorrow ( Monday ) because our preliminary hotel reservations have fallen_through , " Cornella said . ANDREA BUSHNELL
